welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bellaire! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Bellaire has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at David Wayne Hooks Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights and is the oldest terminal at William P Hobby Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights and was recently renovated.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ellington Field Airport serves both commercial and general aviation flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ellington Field Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baytown Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Baytown Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
